### How are soil carbon dynamics influenced by drying vs. wetting events? 

---

```{r map, fig.width=1.5, fig.height=1.5, eval=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(usmap)

test_data <- data.frame(lon = -123.976, lat = 46.907)
transformed_data <- usmap_transform(test_data)
plot_usmap(include = c("WA")) + 
  geom_point(data = transformed_data, 
             aes(x = lon.1, y = lat.1), 
             color = "black",
             size = 2)+
  annotate("text", label = "Beaver Creek \n 46.907 N \n -123.976 W", x = -1670500, y = 482693.1, size=1.5)
```

### code/
`1-moisture_tracking.R`:	tracks moisture in cores for pre-incubation drying  
`2-hyprop`: water retention curves  
`3-picarro`: respiration  
`4-wsoc`: water soluble organic carbon analysis


### data/
`core_key` core assignments

`core_weights` 

 - `initial` initial weights when cores were packed. includes empty weights
 - `Mass_tracking` core weights for pre-incubation drying. Also includes Picarro valve assignments.
 - ignore tabs marked `x_`
